{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Comtrend |model=WR-5931 |revision=(RG21S) |series=AC2600 |fcc_date=03/08/2017 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Edimax |manuf_model=Gemini RG21S |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_id=L9VWR5931, NDD9568771606 |pcb_id=1244-01001054-50Z |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=MediaTek |cpu1_model=MT7621AT |cpu1_cspeed=880 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC64M16GP-DI |wi1_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi1_chip1_model=MT7615N |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=MediaTek |wi2_chip1_model=MT7615N |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, 256QAM, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass= }}
:• '''1733''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''800''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''2600 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC2600 Wireless Router}} This product's FCC entry is a product change from the [[Edimax Gemini RG21S]]. :Most details here are copied from there. "1244-01001054-50Z" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. ===Specifications=== * Product class: ''AC2600'' (800Mbps [2.4GHz] + 1733Mbps [5GHz]) * Antennas: 4x external high-gain antenna * Ports: 1x GbE WAN, 4x GbE LAN ===Forum threads=== *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/routery/edimax/gemini-rg21s/ ''Edimax Gemini RG21S'' on '''OpenITforum'''] (PL) :CPU: [[MediaTek MT7621AT]] @880MHz Dual Core :Flash: 16MB (NOR) Flash :RAM: ''Nanya'' NT5CC64M16GP-DI (128MB DDR3) :WLAN: 2x [[MediaTek]] MT7615N 4T4R 802.11abgn/ac __NOTOC__
